meanings.definition: Appealing to the taste or smell
meanings.sent1: The appetizing aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared an appetizing dish that made everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent3: The appetizing scent of the barbecue made the neighbors peek over the fence.
meanings.sent4: The appetizing flavors danced on my tongue like a delicious melody.
meanings.sent5: The appetizing presentation of the dessert left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The appetizing sight of the juicy burger made me hungry.
meanings.sent2: The bakery's window display was so appetizing that I couldn't resist going in.
meanings.sent3: The appetizing smell of popcorn at the movies always makes me crave a bucket.
meanings.sent4: The appetizing menu descriptions enticed me to order more than I could eat.
meanings.sent5: The appetizing samples at the food fair had people lining up for seconds.

meanings.definition: Tempting or inviting to the senses
meanings.sent1: The appetizing colors of the fruit stand made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent2: The appetizing display of pastries in the bakery window drew in customers.
meanings.sent3: The appetizing sound of sizzling bacon woke everyone up with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The appetizing textures of the dish created a delightful dining experience.
meanings.sent5: The appetizing appearance of the cake was almost too beautiful to eat.
